Name: Swarna Kshetra Farm
Highlights: Organic farming practices focusing on the cultivation of medicinal and aromatic plants, leveraging the rich soil and favorable climate of Mysuru to produce high-quality, chemical-free crops.
Advanced irrigation system utilizing drip irrigation and rainwater harvesting to maximize water efficiency and ensure a sustainable supply for the farm's diverse crop portfolio.

On-site processing unit equipped with modern machinery for cleaning, drying, and packaging crops, adding value to the farm's produce and enabling direct supply to herbal medicine manufacturers and retailers.

Renewable energy solutions, including solar panels and a biogas plant, provide a sustainable power source for the farm's operations, reducing reliance on conventional energy and lowering carbon footprint.

ValueParameters.description: The growing demand for organic medicinal and aromatic plants in India and abroad is driving the market value of farms focusing on organic cultivation.
The Indian government offers subsidies and incentives for sustainable agricultural practices, potentially increasing the profitability of organic farms like Swarna Kshetra.

The farm's adoption of climate-resilient agricultural practices, including rainwater harvesting and drip irrigation, enhances its value by ensuring crop production even in changing climate conditions.
The rapid growth of the herbal medicine market, both domestically and internationally, is increasing demand for high-quality organic raw materials, boosting the farm's investment potential.
Mysuru's growing reputation as a tourist destination and the rising interest in agro-tourism provide additional revenue streams through farm tours and organic product sales.

Proposals.name: Ayurvedic Herb Co.
Proposals.description: Ayurvedic Herb Co. proposes to acquire Swarna Kshetra Farm to expand their organic herb cultivation for Ayurvedic medicine production.

Proposals.name: Green Gold Organics
Proposals.description: Green Gold Organics aims to use the farm to cultivate high-value organic spices and aromatic plants for export markets.
